programmes.show_description: Action adventure with Steven Seagal. Two special forces agents transporting a pair of female convicts to prison come under attack by a mercenary force sent to kill them.
Action thriller with Tyrese Gibson. An ex-Marine suffering from PTSD is forced to confront his fears when he and a group of innocent customers are taken hostage at a retail outlet.

A woman claims she caught her boyfriend at a hotel with another woman and submits video evidence of him allegedly trying to break into her house.
A woman files for a restraining order against her boyfriend after he allegedly throws a boot at her and bruises her.
A woman sues her deceased grandson's former fiancée for the cost of a headstone after a $10,000 life insurance pay-out.
A defendant is ill-prepared for questions from the Judge when she is sued by her ex-roommate for a security deposit.
A pregnant woman accuses her brother of stranding her in Maryland while she was working for his trucking business; both want to stop the drama.
A midwife makes the hard call to stay with a client whose baby just died instead of attending to a woman just beginning a difficult labour.
A woman's jealous rage leads to a computer allegedly being thrown across the room and a cellphone being crushed.
A couple move in with mum to improve credit scores and save for a new home; unfortunately, a fight over money and tools divide them.
A man denies destroying property and sues his ex-landlord for throwing everything he owned out on the street.

Vanishing Man: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Detective Keogh and SIO Terry Crompton discuss the 2016 murder of Yang Liu, whose torso was found in a suitcase.
In a case that captured worldwide attention, the Menendez brothers were tried and convicted of murdering their parents, Jose and Kitty Menendez.
A mother and daughter vanish whilst out shopping. When the girl turns up dead, the mother is the initial suspect. But who really killed her?
The Cheater: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. When offered a job as a security chief at a resort, CD ends up investigating his predecessor's death.
Sci-fi thriller with Logan Marshall-Green. A mugging victim left confined to a wheelchair seeks revenge with an experimental computer chip implant - until it starts taking over his body.
Action thriller sequel with Danny Trejo. The relentless Mexican mercenary is hired by the American president to stop a billionaire arms dealer's plot to start a nuclear war.
Fantasy sequel with Christopher Lambert. Immortal Connor MacLeod's new-found happiness and settled family life are shattered by the sudden reappearance of his arch-enemy Kane.
Tense thriller. When a Vietnam veteran returns home from prison to discover that a violent biker gang has been harassing his family, he enlists the help of a drug baron in a quest for revenge.

A seven-year feud between two neighbours escalates and ends in court with incriminating video evidence of harassment and property damage.
When a man misses a few car payments on a car he bought with his ex-girlfriend, she reports the vehicle as stolen; the Judge sets her straight.
After a trip to Costa Rica, friends fight over unpaid travel expenses and unfair charges.
A woman accuses the father of her child of skipping out on car payments because she filed for child support.
When a child has scratches and a few too many bruises, a concerned father calls DCS on his son's mother; she says his claims were malicious.
A woman claims her horse was neglected, beaten and malnourished while in the care of her former horse trainer.
A man accuses his neighbour's horse of vandalism; she breaks down when he calls into question a Kickstarter for her cancer treatment.
When a woman allegedly threatens her landlord in an angry rant, he files a TRO; she claims she was forced to live in a car while her children lived inside.
A mother of eight, who was allegedly desperate to get her figure back, is sued by her ex-fiancé for a plastic surgery loan and for false charges filed with CPS.

Cuckoo's Nest: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
With the help of SIO Pete Simm, Detective Inspector Steve Keogh leads us through the multi-layered investigation of the 2012 murder of beloved Christopher Proctor.
Well-known beauty executive Fabio Sementilli was sitting by his swimming pool when he was brutally stabbed to death.
When a prostitute is brutally murdered, her body is dumped in a waterway. Investigators find a tiny clue which could point to the killer.
The Alibi: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Walker helps a wrestler whose ex-wife is in hiding after witnessing a murder.
Action thriller with Owen Wilson. An American family moves to Asia, but faces a fight for survival when a revolution sweeps the country and the new government seeks to eliminate foreigners
Action adventure with Antonio Banderas. A disgraced Arabic nobleman exiled from his Baghdad home joins forces with Norse warriors to fight shadowy fiends at the end of the first millennium.
